title: America's 'Trumpiest' Lawyer
itunes:title: America's 'Trumpiest' Lawyer
description:
David Yaffe-Bellany, Bloomberg Legal Reporter, discusses Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton who is fighting the Biden administration, past securities charges, and corruption allegations from his own former staff.

Carl Tobias, a professor at the University of Richmond Law School, discusses how President Joe Biden has confirmed more judicial nominees than any other President since Richard Nixon at this point in the first year of his presidency.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
